thread.section_title: HiFX Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX Australia | hifx.com.au
thread.title: Ollington

author: Ollington
title: Ollington
text: HiFX enabled me to pay for accommodation in the currency requested by the owners of the accommodation I had booked. Other money transfer services limited the currency choice and that stymied my ability to pay by funds transfer. Also HiFX does not charge a fee but makes its money on a declared rate of exchange. The rate of exchange changes in real time so I know exactly what rate I lock into when I click the commit button.
